WorkItem.ClosedComment: Check your socket bonuses, other than that, it's because you are targeting a level 88 boss
WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
I noticed a small difference between the defstats of my pèrot paladin shown to me in the armory and the papertoon shown to me by rawr.
 
iE: Arsenal:
 
http://eu.battle.net/wow/en/character/festung-der-sturme/schrom/advanced
 
Dodge: 1388 11.98%
Parry: 1532 12.97%
Block 57,64%
 
Rawr: 
 
Dodge: 1388 11.37%
Parry: 1517 12.29%
Block: 57,03%
 
I noticed that strangth is off a little bit too: 
Arsenal: 3091
Rawr: 3031
 
how do you explain these differences?

Comments.Message:
yes, I changed the boss to lvl 85 and now Dodge and Block show the right value, although parry is still off by 0,07% because (imo) strength is still shown with 3031 instead of 3091.

I use all the socket bonuses and they seem to be calculated in the right way.
